mapper.delete: delete customer_recharges from customer_recharges inner join customers on customer_recharges.recharge_customer_id = customers.customer_id where customers.customer_company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into customer_recharges (recharge_type, recharge_money, recharge_customer_id, recharge_addtime, recharge_number, batch_number, recharge_bak, recharge_station, recharge_client, recharge_moneyserver, recharge_bank, recharge_bankarea, recharge_banknumber, recharge_moneynow, recharge_istoexcel, recharge_moneybt, recharge_istorecord, recharge_recall_time, recharge_recall_result, recharge_state, recharge_audit_first_time, recharge_audit_first_member, recharge_audit_first_remark, recharge_audit_second_time, recharge_audit_second_remark, recharge_audit_second_member, resource_id) values (#{rechargeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rechargeCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rechargeAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rechargeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeBak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeStation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeClient,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeMoneyserver,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rechargeBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeBankarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeBanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeMoneynow,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rechargeIstoexcel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeMoneybt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rechargeIstorecord,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeRecallTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rechargeRecallResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rechargeAuditFirstTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rechargeAuditFirstMember,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rechargeAuditFirstRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeAuditSecondTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rechargeAuditSecondRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rechargeAuditSecondMember,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

recharge_type = #{rechargeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

recharge_customer_id = #{rechargeCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recharge_addtime = #{rechargeAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
recharge_number = #{rechargeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

recharge_bak = #{rechargeBak,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recharge_station = #{rechargeStation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recharge_client = #{rechargeClient,jdbcType=INTEGER},

recharge_audit_second_time = #{rechargeAuditSecondTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
recharge_audit_second_remark = #{rechargeAuditSecondRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recharge_audit_second_member = #{rechargeAuditSecondMember,jdbcType=BIGINT},
resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
where recharge_id = #{rechargeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
